resources.string: OrdStores requires the following permissions. Give OrdStores access to phone, message, location, contacts and screen overlay.
Please check your internet connection and swipe down to refresh
Looks like you haven\'t added any store. Add a store by clicking on the button below
Making orders online couldn\'t have been easier. You can place orders anywhere on your phone!
Get instant notification when your order is available, confirmed and ready to leave the shelves
View a complete catalogue of products from different merchants
Pay online or pay in person when order is delivered
